trans-unit.source: Suggest edits without changing the text. All suggestions are marked for review.
trans-unit.target: Suggest edits without changing the text. All suggestions are marked for review.

trans-unit.source: Add, edit, or delete comments and use threads or comments-only mode for focus.
trans-unit.target: Add, edit, or delete comments and use threads or comments-only mode for focus.

trans-unit.source: View, compare, or restore older versions and recover content when needed.
trans-unit.target: View, compare, or restore older versions and recover content when needed.

trans-unit.source: Let multiple users edit, comment, suggest, and review document history together.
trans-unit.target: Let multiple users edit, comment, suggest, and review document history together.

trans-unit.source: Convert Word files to clean HTML with formatting, comments, and changes kept.
trans-unit.target: Convert Word files to clean HTML with formatting, comments, and changes kept.

trans-unit.source: Generate a polished PDF from the editor with accurate formatting and layout.
trans-unit.target: Generate a polished PDF from the editor with accurate formatting and layout.

trans-unit.source: Use the AI Assistant to write, rephrase, translate, or summarize text instantly.
trans-unit.target: Use the AI Assistant to write, rephrase, translate, or summarize text instantly.

trans-unit.source: Insert inline footnotes with automatic numbering to keep notes consistent.
trans-unit.target: Insert inline footnotes with automatic numbering to keep notes consistent.

trans-unit.target: Use AI to check spelling, grammar, and punctuation with instant suggestions.

trans-unit.target: Preview page breaks during editing to see the final layout before export.

trans-unit.target: Add formatted mathematical notation and chemical formulas easily.

trans-unit.target: Create numbered lists like 1, 1.1, 1.1.1 to keep structure clear and organized.

trans-unit.target: Use “/” to insert blocks, styles, or content quickly. Create custom commands too.

trans-unit.target: Use templates to add ready-made blocks or full layouts like letters and reports.

trans-unit.source: Paste from Word or Excel with accurate formatting and clean HTML output.
trans-unit.target: Paste from Word or Excel with accurate formatting and clean HTML output.

trans-unit.target: Copy formatting from one place and apply it elsewhere for consistent styling.

trans-unit.target: List document headings in a sidebar for quick navigation through long content.

trans-unit.target: Insert an auto-updating table of contents with linked headings for navigation.

trans-unit.target: Switch text between uppercase, lowercase, or title case with one click.

trans-unit.target: Use the editor in full screen for more space. Part of the free CKEditor Plugin Pack.

trans-unit.target: Grouping toolbar items in dropdowns (nested toolbars)

trans-unit.target: It will create a "Basic styles" dropdown with a three vertical dots icon (

trans-unit.target: Add headings to structure content clearly and improve readability.

trans-unit.target: Align content left, right, center, or justify to keep your layout clean.

trans-unit.target: Apply predefined styles with CSS classes to enhance appearance and meaning.

trans-unit.source: Use “@” to tag users, groups, or topics and get smart suggestions while typing.
trans-unit.target: Use “@” to tag users, groups, or topics and get smart suggestions while typing.

trans-unit.source: The license key is required for Feature Pack, Collaboration Pack, as well as the Productivity Pack.
trans-unit.target: The license key is required for Feature Pack, Collaboration Pack, as well as the Productivity Pack.

trans-unit.source: Select the authorization suitable type for your features. The access key-based authorization is highly recommended and the best option in a production environment. The development token should rather be used for testing purposes. The authorization credentials are required for Real-time collaboration or Import from Word, and optional for Export to Word/PDF to generate documents without the watermark.
trans-unit.target: Select the authorization suitable type for your features. The access key-based authorization is highly recommended and the best option in a production environment. The development token should rather be used for testing purposes. The authorization credentials are required for Real-time collaboration or Import from Word, and optional for Export to Word/PDF to generate documents without the watermark.

trans-unit.source: The environment management panel can be found in CKEditor dashboard .
trans-unit.target: The environment management panel can be found in CKEditor dashboard .

trans-unit.source: The access key for the environment can be found in the CKEditor dashboard .
trans-unit.target: The access key for the environment can be found in the CKEditor dashboard .

trans-unit.source: Use the development token URL only for testing purposes. It does not provide full permission validation.</br>For production environments, it is strongly recommended to use the Environment ID and Access Key instead.
trans-unit.target: Use the development token URL only for testing purposes. It does not provide full permission validation.</br>For production environments, it is strongly recommended to use the Environment ID and Access Key instead.

trans-unit.source:
The Organization ID is available in the CKEditor dashboard .
Required for Real-time collaboration and API requests.
trans-unit.target:
The Organization ID is available in the CKEditor dashboard .
Required for Real-time collaboration and API requests.

trans-unit.source: The API key is also available in the CKEditor dashboard and is required for real-time collaboration and API requests
trans-unit.target: The API key is also available in the CKEditor dashboard and is required for real-time collaboration and API requests

trans-unit.source:
The web socket url can be found in the CKEditor dashboard .
You can leave this field empty - the system will automatically generate this URL using Organization ID field
trans-unit.target:
The web socket url can be found in the CKEditor dashboard .
You can leave this field empty - the system will automatically generate this URL using Organization ID field

trans-unit.source:
The API base URL can be found in the CKEditor dashboard .
If left empty, the system automatically creates it using the Organization ID and Environment ID.
trans-unit.target:
The API base URL can be found in the CKEditor dashboard .
If left empty, the system automatically creates it using the Organization ID and Environment ID.

trans-unit.source: The basic styles feature lets you apply the most essential formatting such as bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, subscript, superscript, and code. Coupled with more formatting features, these serve as a base for any WYSIWYG editor toolset.
trans-unit.target: The basic styles feature lets you apply the most essential formatting such as bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, subscript, superscript, and code. Coupled with more formatting features, these serve as a base for any WYSIWYG editor toolset.

trans-unit.source: The source editing feature lets you view and edit the source of your document.
trans-unit.target: The source editing feature lets you view and edit the source of your document.

trans-unit.source: Enhanced source editing with syntax highlighting, code formatting, and improved editing experience for viewing and editing document source code.
trans-unit.target: Enhanced source editing with syntax highlighting, code formatting, and improved editing experience for viewing and editing document source code.

trans-unit.source: Add and manage bookmarks to navigate long documents and create quick links.
trans-unit.target: Add and manage bookmarks to navigate long documents and create quick links.

trans-unit.source: Enter a unique identifier without any spaces.
trans-unit.target: Enter a unique identifier without any spaces.

trans-unit.source: It is already in use, please use unique value
trans-unit.target: It is already in use, please use unique value

trans-unit.source: Enter a value followed by a unit (e.g., 10mm or 20px).
trans-unit.target: Enter a value followed by a unit (e.g., 10mm or 20px).

trans-unit.source: Enter your OpenAI API key, prefixed with 'Bearer' (e.g., 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY')
trans-unit.target: Enter your OpenAI API key, prefixed with 'Bearer' (e.g., 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY')

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid token URL to continue
trans-unit.target: Please enter a valid token URL to continue

trans-unit.source: To use real-time collaboration features—such as comments, track changes, and revision history — you must disable the Source Editing plugin, as raw HTML editing is not compatible with the collaboration engine
trans-unit.target: To use real-time collaboration features—such as comments, track changes, and revision history — you must disable the Source Editing plugin, as raw HTML editing is not compatible with the collaboration engine

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you must save the RTE content at least once before making any edits. Without this initial save, comments, track changes, or revision history data may be lost.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you must save the RTE content at least once before making any edits. Without this initial save, comments, track changes, or revision history data may be lost.

trans-unit.source: The toolbar configuration from your YAML preset is now managed by the CKEditor Pack extension's drag-and-drop toolbar interface. This means that, at runtime, the CKEditor Pack configuration takes precedence and defines the active toolbar — your YAML file remains intact but is no longer the source for toolbar rendering.
trans-unit.target: The toolbar configuration from your YAML preset is now managed by the CKEditor Pack extension's drag-and-drop toolbar interface. This means that, at runtime, the CKEditor Pack configuration takes precedence and defines the active toolbar — your YAML file remains intact but is no longer the source for toolbar rendering.

trans-unit.source: The Side option is not supported when using the Sidebar type.
trans-unit.target: The Side option is not supported when using the Sidebar type.
